init_messages.content: You are an assistant that summarize user input.

Due to how affordable the clothing is and how new trends convince consumers to seek out more, the value of clothes may diminish in the eyes of consumers. As of 2019, the current report shows that 62 million metric tons of apparel were consumed globally.
init_messages.name: example_user

init_messages.content: One of the significant differences is that airplanes have more limitations to taking off and manuvering in different spaces than a helicopters
init_messages.name: example_assistant

template.default_message: You are an assistant that summarize user input.

examples.input: Due to how affordable the clothing is and how new trends convince consumers to seek out more, the value of clothes may diminish in the eyes of consumers. As of 2019, the current report shows that 62 million metric tons of apparel were consumed globally.
